title: PMS 2.0 277 - TNF NFC East Mega Bowl Preview, Dwight Freeney, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys react to his appearance last night on NXT helping crown a new pair of tag team champions, and look ahead to tonight's Thursday Night Football NFC East Mega Bowl between the Eagles and the Giants. Joining the show to chat about Quarterback over under totals and tonight's game is friend of the program, 9 year NFL veteran at Defensive Back, co-host of the Man-To-Man Pod, and Everything DB, Darius Butler. Pat and Darius discuss the best bets for tonight's game, the situation going on in the locker room in Dallas, and who Darius thinks is going to win tonight's Thursday Night Football game (19:43-39:08). Later, Super Bowl Champion, 7x Pro Bowler, 4x All-Pro, NFL 2000's All-Decade Team, 2005 Defensive Player of the Year, Indianapolis Colts Ring of Honor member, and future 1st ballot Hall of Famer, Dwight Freeney, joins the show. Pat and Dwight chat about what a defensive lineman is thinking when an entire offensive line has to stop practicing like the Raiders, his thoughts on how this NFL season has been like so far, some younger players that remind him of himself, how difficult it is to still carve out playing time when you start getting older, what Michael Jordan is like when playing cards, and much more (42:10-1:10:22). Later is another installment of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk where Pat and AJ discuss tonight's game, give some picks, and chat about everything else happening in the NFL (1:10:24-1:31:56). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we have reached 1 million subscribers and are giving away $100,000, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
